scripts.start:prod:without:docker: unset DEV UNITSTESTS && npm run env && npm run build && TZ='UTC' node dist/src/app.js
scripts.ibp:frontend: npm run install:frontend && npm run build:frontend && npm run prod:frontend
scripts.dev:backend: export DEV='1' &&npm run rm && npm run env && TZ='UTC' DEV='1' nodemon src/app.ts
scripts.indent: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.ibt: npm run indent && npm run build && npm run test:rm
scripts.rm: npm run env:rm && npm run tests:rm
scripts.rm:prod: npm run env:rm && npm run tests:rm && npm run logs:rm && npm run rm:sqlite && rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.test:noCovDebug: npm run rm:sqlite && UNITSTESTS='1' && export DEBUG=engine,socket* && npm run env && jest --detectOpenHandles --config jest.onlyTest.config.ts
scripts.test:noCov: npm run rm:sqlite && export UNITSTESTS='1' && npm run env && npm run format && npm run build && jest --detectOpenHandles --config jest.onlyTest.config.ts
scripts.test:Cov: npm run rm:sqlite && export UNITSTESTS='1'  && npm run env && npm run build && jest --detectOpenHandles --config jest.config.ts
scripts.test:fmt:Cov: npm run rm:sqlite && export UNITSTESTS='1' && npm run env && npm run format && npm run build && jest --detectOpenHandles --config jest.config.ts
scripts.test: npm run rm:sqlite && export UNITSTESTS='1' && npm run env && npm run format && npm run build && jest --detectOpenHandles > src/tests/output.txt --config jest.config.ts
scripts.test:rm: npm run rm:sqlite && npm run test && npm run tests:rm
scripts.test:prod: npm run rm:prod && npm install && npm run build && npm run test:cov:prod
scripts.crash: export UNITSTESTS='1' && npm run env && jest --detectOpenHandles --config jest.onlyTest.config.ts src/tests/DisconnectDuringSoloGameButWaitingRoomNotEmpty.spec.ts
